properties.title: Welcome to the AJF Remoting Developer Website

section.name: Welcome
section.p: The Remoting module is an optional AJF module who provides functionnalities to connect to remote resources. The module is based on the Handler interface to provide automatic implementation of user interfaces annotated correctly.
It provides implementation for the following strategies :

ul.li: Stored procedure mapping with the @StoredProcedure annotation
JAX-RS webservice with the XXX annotation (Work in progress !)
JAX-WS webservice with the XXX annotation (Work in progress !)
